attribute.value: select key,value from( select '-1' as key,'全行' as value from csb_jglb union select lbdh as key,lbmc as value from csb_jglb ) t order by key

sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgjfxsdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'考核指标名称输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.khzbmc)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgjfxsdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'机构类别输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.jglb)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgjfxsdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'标准得分系数输入错误，只能输入:4位整数,2位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.bzxs)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.bzxs,4,2)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgjfxsdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'标准得分系数输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.bzxs)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgjfxsdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'超计划得分系数输入错误，只能输入:4位整数,2位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.cjhxs)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.cjhxs,4,2)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgjfxsdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'超计划得分系数输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.cjhxs)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgjfxsdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'超力争得分系数输入错误，只能输入:4位整数,2位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.clzxs)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.clzxs,4,2)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgjfxsdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'超力争得分系数输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.clzxs)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgjfxsdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'起始日期输入错误，格式应该是:yyyyMMdd!' where f_java_rule_date(t.qsrq,'yyyyMMdd')=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgjfxsdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'起始日期输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.qsrq)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgjfxsdr_temp t set error=error||'考核指标名称不存在!' where not exists ( select 1 from khfa_khzb_jg jg where t.khzbmc=jg.khzbmc) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgjfxsdr_temp t set error=error||'机构类别名称不存在!' where not exists ( select 1 from csb_jglb lb where 1=1 and ( t.jglb = lb.lbmc or t.jglb='全行') ) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgjfxsdr_temp t set t.error= t.error||'起始日期不能小于(系统日期-重跑天数)'||f_change_days((SELECT cast(rq.csz as integer) FROM xtb_xtcs rq WHERE rq.csmc='SYS_DATE'),-(SELECT cast(cs.csz as integer) FROM xtb_xtcs cs WHERE cs.csmc='SYS_CSTS'))||'!' where cast( t.qsrq as integer)<(select f_change_days(cast(rq.csz as integer ),-cast(cs.csz as integer )) from xtb_xtcs rq ,xtb_xtcs cs where rq.csmc='SYS_DATE' and cs.csmc='SYS_CSTS' ) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgjfxsdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'数据已存在!' where exists ( select 1 from CSB_KHZBXS_JG tar inner join KHFA_KHZB_JG jg on jg.khzbdh=tar.khzbdh inner join (select '-1' as lbdh,'全行' as lbmc from csb_jglb union select lbdh ,lbmc from csb_jglb ) lb on lb.lbdh =tar.jglb where 1=1 and t.khzbmc=jg.khzbmc and t.jglb=lb.lbmc and 2=tar.YYZLBH and tar.QSRQ >= cast(t.qsrq as Integer) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null ))

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgjfxsdr_temp t set t.error=error||'存在重复数据!' where exists( select 1 from (select khzbmc,jglb from jgjfxsdr_temp dr where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ group by khzbmc,jglb having count(1)>1 ) dr where 1=1 and t.khzbmc=dr.khzbmc and t.jglb=dr.jglb) and khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ CREATE TABLE jgjfxsdr_temp ( khzbmc varchar(100) , jglb varchar(100) , qsrq varchar(100) , bzxs varchar(100) , cjhxs varchar(100) , clzxs varchar(100) , khdxdh integer,error varchar(1000) )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from jgjfxsdr_temp where length(error) > 0 and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from jgjfxsdr_temp where length(error) > 0 and error != '数据已存在!' and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, khzbmc,jglb,qsrq,bzxs,cjhxs,clzxs,khdxdh,error from jgjfxsdr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and length(error)>0
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select '' as zt, khzbmc,jglb,qsrq,bzxs,cjhxs,clzxs,khdxdh,error from jgjfxsdr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )a
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, khzbmc,jglb,qsrq,bzxs,cjhxs,clzxs,khdxdh,error from jgjfxsdr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from CSB_KHZBXS_JG tar where exists ( select 1 from jgjfxsdr_temp t inner join KHFA_KHZB_JG jg on jg.khzbmc=t.khzbmc inner join (select '-1' as lbdh,'全行' as lbmc from csb_jglb union select lbdh ,lbmc from csb_jglb ) lb on lb.lbmc=t.jglb where (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null or t.error='数据已存在!') and jg.khzbdh=tar.khzbdh and lb.lbdh =tar.jglb and 2=tar.YYZLBH and tar.qsrq >= cast(t.qsrq as integer) )
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update CSB_KHZBXS_JG tar set jsrq=( select F_Change_Days(cast(dr.qsrq as Integer),-1) from jgjfxsdr_temp dr inner join KHFA_KHZB_JG jg on jg.khzbmc=dr.khzbmc inner join (select '-1' as lbdh,'全行' as lbmc from csb_jglb union select lbdh ,lbmc from csb_jglb ) lb on lb.lbmc=dr.jglb where 1=1 and (length(dr.error)=0 or dr.error is null or dr.error='数据已存在!') and jg.khzbdh=tar.khzbdh and lb.lbdh =tar.jglb and 2=tar.YYZLBH and dr.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ ) where exists( select 1 from jgjfxsdr_temp t inner join KHFA_KHZB_JG jg2 on jg2.khzbmc=t.khzbmc inner join (select '-1' as lbdh,'全行' as lbmc from csb_jglb union select lbdh ,lbmc from csb_jglb ) lb2 on lb2.lbmc=t.jglb where 1=1 and jg2.khzbdh=tar.khzbdh and lb2.lbdh =tar.jglb and 2=tar.YYZLBH and (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null or t.error='数据已存在!') and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and tar.jsrq = (select max(jsrq) from CSB_KHZBXS_JG where khzbdh=jg2.khzbdh and 2=YYZLBH and lb2.lbdh =jglb) )
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into CSB_KHZBXS_JG(khzbdh,jglb,yyzlbh,qsrq,jsrq,bzxs,cjhxs,clzxs) ( select jg.khzbdh as khzbdh,lb.lbdh as jglb,2 ,cast(t.qsrq as DECIMAL(22,0)) ,29991231 ,cast(t.bzxs as DECIMAL(22,2)) ,cast(t.cjhxs as DECIMAL(22,2)) ,cast(t.clzxs as DECIMAL(22,2)) from jgjfxsdr_temp t inner join KHFA_KHZB_JG jg on jg.khzbmc=t.khzbmc inner join (select '-1' as lbdh,'全行' as lbmc from csb_jglb union select lbdh ,lbmc from csb_jglb ) lb on lb.lbmc=t.jglb where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (t.error = '数据已存在!' or length(t.error) = 0 or t.error is null) )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select key,value from( select '-1' as key,'全行' as value from csb_jglb union select lbdh as key,lbmc as value from csb_jglb ) t order by key
